text: Arturo Ortega Juárez (born August 30, 1976 in Mexico City) is a Mexican football manager and former player. ==External links== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican football managers Category:Mexican footballers Category:Club Universidad Nacional footballers Category:Atlético Mexiquense footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Footballers from Mexico City Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Arturo Ortega
